typeSystemDescription.name: Morphological Tag Linguistic Type
typeSystemDescription.description:
This is the linguistic type of morphological tags, which extends the UIMA Annotation type. As a result, it contains the features of Begin and End. It is used for annotating words with their morphological tags.
Dependency: Linguistic_type: Token

typeDescription.name: com.ctapweb.feature.type.MorphologicalTag
typeDescription.description: the morphological tag of a token

featureDescription.name: morphologicalTag
featureDescription.description: the morphological tag as a String
